A game created by the Half-Life modding community and then supported and updated to the Source engine by Valve via hiring the DoD team. Developed by gamers for gamers. That is enough reason to get and play this game. Nowdays (2011) there is still a huge gaming community both for vanilla gameplay as well as GunGame gameplay.

Très très bonne reprise de Day of Defeat 1.3, ce qui fait de ces 2 jeux, les meilleurs FPS multijoueurs de seconde guerre mondiale auquels j'ai pus jouer.
Un très bon gameplay, une accessibilité beaucoup plus grande que le 1.3, un très bon felling avec les armes et utilise bien le moteur source. Contrairement à CS:S les le jeu parait moins "plastique/pâte à modeler". 
Un excellent jeu en rapport qualité/prix.

「これまでの屈辱を今晴らしてやる！」と意気込んだアル中まっしぐらな彼。しかし、またしても乗り物はなかった。やけ酒飲みまくりながらも、後にBF2なるものに出会う。「もう翼から空挺とか潜水艦を発見してだめだ！と言われるなんて要素はないはずだ。サーバー落とす位に暴れてやる！」と意気込んだ彼。だったが、乗っては特殊兵に破壊され、走っては工兵に破壊され、トドメは対戦車兵のRAWを直に食らって即死、さらには戦闘機の爆撃に蹂躙される、攻撃ヘリに蹂躙される、轢き逃げするつもりが逆に轢き逃げされるという始末。アル中も手伝って狂いだした彼は、ナイフ & ピストル鯖でルール無視で暴れまわり、karkandで建物内侵入バグで暴れまわり、最後にはUAV大量発生バグで鯖を落としまくり悪質プレイヤーに成り果てた。
A very good WWII multiplayer FPS game, especially you have to rely everything on your skill, no inventory, no buying weapon, no customization, no special skills, no power-ups and no hats bullsh*t.

Рекомендую!

Day of Defeat: Source is an old frills-free WWII multiplayer shooter, and a remake of a Half-Life mod that saw [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/trar/recommended/30]its own separate release[/url]. It's comparable to [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/trar/recommended/10]Counter-Strike[/url] in World War II.

DoD:S generally has less of everything compared to the original mod, but this provides for a more streamlined, balanced experience, not to mention a smoother one. It was used as a testbed for early Source engine technology, so it has that early Source look that's starting to become a bit retro, yet still looks good - and you get ragdoll physics as well.

There is still an active community of several hundred players, although most active servers belong to 'regiment' clans that are very good at killing you and can trip you up with their realism-adding plugins. Downloading [url=https://sourceforge.net/projects/rcbot2/]the latest version of RCBot2[/url] will let you set up bots to play by yourself, however the setup process can be fiddly.

10 out of 10

Sourceエンジンを使ったFPSの一つで、舞台は見ての通りWW2。CS:Sなどとは違いあまり流行はしなかったが、バランスの良いクラス制と分かりやすいルール、適度なサイズと複雑さのマップ、と内容としては良く出来たゲーム。時期的なモノが悪かったのだろうか。おそらく想定されているのは16:16規模だろうが、2011年2月現在でその規模のゲームをプレイするのはJP鯖でなく、中国やロシアのサーバーで遊ぶほうが現実的。日本人相手でないと嫌だ！という人でなければオススメの一つ。

Way Back When I was a huge Fan of the battlefield series my favorite being BF1942. 
Day of Defeat has come bring WWII games back to our computers. 
Day of Defeat uses the valve engines and graphics to the may more realistic and fun to play as the new multiplayer shooter. 
The Multiple classes have an automatic ballancing system in place to prevent too much of one class at once. many maps allow only 1 or 2 snipers which can make other players not fear to walk outside their bunker. The Machine Gunner has been made extremely well, like the sniper only 2 at max per team makes whoever has this gun, a deadly foe. 
I recommend this game those who enjoy WWII games and squad based FPS. Realism teams are forming by the masses and are welcome to have you join.
